entry.title: Bitcoin Node Speed Test
entry.summary: In an email conversation on July 23, 2015, Marcel Jamin and Peter Todd discuss measuring the upload capacity of peers by downloading from them. Marcel initially questions whether he is being dumb for thinking this method is used. Peter responds with a humorous comment saying that Marcel is not being dumb. The email ends with Peter's contact information and a digital signature. No other context or background information is provided.
